page.title: 16ENTERTAINMENT PIER MANAGER
page.content: We interviewed Mr. Winter, manager of the pier bowl. He said:" The pier is an outing for the family. You usually find that children come down with their parents and it goes on year after year after year. Walton isn't really a commercialised town. It is literally a town by the seaside. People come down mainly for the beach and the sea. People normally spend 3-4 hours on the pier. It doesn't matter if it's rainy or sunny because the pier is under cover. People come down mainly for the rides, bowling and arcade." They try to improve the pier all the time. In the old days, each ride was owned by a family.
